EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_VMworld_2014.Follow Up Booth 3
EmailTemplate.subject: A closer look: Pivotal CF
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
I hope you are well.
I thought it would of interest to you to see some case studies related to Pivotal CF.
- CoreLogic product and data Delivery platform based on Pivotal CF (CF Summit 2014) <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HZWkfOe1-tc> - Phillips Digital Health Platform (CF Summit 2014) <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=62wTc-YS_Yw> - Monsanto innovates with new Enterprise PaaS capabilities (CF Summit 2014) <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJCB7OGeY9o>
These case studies exhibit how Pivotal CF can help reduce costs and increase the speed in which Enterprise companies deliver applications. For more information about Pivotal CF, please visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf> or review replays of some of our past webinars <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-webinar-series>.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact me when you are ready to talk about how Pivotal CF can benefit you and your business.
Kind regards,
Sarah Clayton Pivotal EMEA NEMEA ISR Account Manager +44 7585 995 090 <tel:+44 7585 995 090> sclayton@pivotal.io <mailto:sclayton@pivotal.io?subject=Responding to: Pivotal CF - Case Studies> http://pivotal.io/ <http://pivotal.io/>
